dataset_id: LBA-ECO LC-21 Foliar Nutrients, Logged Areas, Tapajos Forest, Para, Brazil: 2003
title: LBA-ECO LC-21 Foliar Nutrients, Logged Areas, Tapajos Forest, Para, Brazil: 2003
summary: This data set provides measurements for foliar nutrients from logging blocks in the Tapajos National Forest, Para Western Santarem, Brazil. Data are included for calcium (Ca), phosphorus (P), magnesium (Mg), nitrogen (N), and potassium (K) concentrations. In March 2003 foliar samples were collected from the cover types remaining after selective logging in 2002: forest, tree-fall gaps, skids, roads, and deck areas. Fresh foliage was also collected in March 2003, from 192 upper canopy species at an intact forest site 17 km from the logging area. There are two data files with this data set.

citation: Dos Santos, V., F. Laurent, C. Abe, and F. Messner. 2018. Hydrologic Response to Land Use Change in a Large Basin in Eastern Amazon. Water. 10(4):429.
Hashemi, S., Y. Filion, and V. Speight. 2018. Identification of Factors That Influence Energy Performance in Water Distribution System Mains. Water. 10(4):428.
